name: Sableye
author: Miki Tanaka
flavor_text: This Pokémon is feared. When its gemstone eyes begin to glow with a sinister shine, it’s believed that Sableye will steal people’s spirits away.

attacks.name: Quick Hunt
attacks.effect: If you go first, you can use this attack on your first turn. Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Cursed Drop
attacks.effect: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent’s Pokémon in any way you like.
